code: import React,{useState}from'react';import FullCalendar from'@fullcalendar/react';import dayGridPlugin from'@fullcalendar/daygrid';import'./Booking.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Booking(){const[events,setEvents]=useState([{title:'Demo Booked',date:'2025-10-10'}]);const handleDateClick=info=>{const title=prompt('Enter booking title:');if(title){setEvents([...events,{title,date:info.dateStr}]);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Book a Demo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FullCalendar,{plugins:[dayGridPlugin],initialView:"dayGridMonth",events:events,dateClick:handleDateClick})]});}export default Booking;
